text: The Freedom Movement (, GS), formerly known as the Green Actions Party (, Z.DEJ), is a green-liberal political party in Slovenia. Its founding congress took place on 8 May 2021. It was founded by Jure Leben. In January 2022, the party was taken over by Robert Golob who also changed the name to Freedom Movement. The party defeated the Slovenian Democratic Party and its three-term prime minister Janez Jan≈°a in April 2022 elections. ==References== Category:Political parties in Europe Category:Organizations based in Slovenia Category:Politics of Slovenia
title: Freedom Movement (Slovenia)
